data.expected_result: You should be able to click on the deny/accept button
data.short_description: Not being able to accept/ignore friend request in profile user (used my alt to send a friend request on ipad)
data.steps_to_repro: - Send friend request to your alt (iPhone) - Accept it on your iPad - Remove them as friend - Send friend request again via iPhone (knowing it doesn’t work) (stay in view profile of your alt) - Send friend request on ipad to your main (stay on view profile of your main) - Observe
